ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I have been using OLLY gummies for several months and can say they may help. My experience indicates, however, that they are most helpful when used least. By that I mean the body seems to habituate to the pill and not work as well if used frequently. That is why I learned to not have a gummy every night. Each person is different and you have to find what dosage and frequency works best for you. Another issue that you need to take into account has to do with storage and shipping temperatures. As another customer noted, heat causes the gummies to sort of "melt." That occurred to me yesterday when a new pack was shipped from Kentucky to Texas via UPS Next Day Air, a two day time period. Upon arrival, I was impressed that two little cool packs were in the Amazon delivery package. The bad news was that the cool packs were warm. I immediately opened the OLLY package and found the pills were mushy and sticking to each other and the packaging. I poured them out on a plate, separated the gummies, and cooled them off in the frig for a while. They were okay at that point to put back in the package and treat them as normal (on a shelf in an air conditioned house.) If your house is too warm, you should keep the package in a fridge.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: If you’re having trouble slipping into the sweet embrace of sleep, let me introduce you to OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummies, the little treat that knows exactly how to get you in the mood. These gummies are packed with 5 mg of Melatonin and a touch of L-Theanine, working together to gently guide you into the arms of Morpheus.With just one taste, you'll find yourself surrendering to their irresistible charm. They're sweet, but not too sweet — just the right amount of temptation to make you want more. And trust me, one gummy is enough to get the job done. These little delights work their magic slowly, coaxing you into relaxation with every soft chew until you're completely under their spell.The L-Theanine adds just the right amount of calm to help you unwind, while the Melatonin does the heavy lifting, carrying you away into a world where your worries melt away. It's like a gentle caress that eases you into dreamland, making you feel like you're floating on a cloud.So, if you're looking to spice up your nightly routine and want something that really knows how to put you to bed, OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummies are here to satisfy. Just pop one in, let it do its thing, and before you know it, you’ll be sinking into your sheets, ready for a night of deep, uninterrupted pleasure... I mean, sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: Finding a sleep aid that works can feel like searching for a needle in a haystack. With OLLY Extra Strength Sleep gummies, my search may finally be over. This product has been a revelation in my nightly routine, offering me the restful sleep that had been eluding me for so long. Here's why I'm now a firm believer in these sleep gummies:Effectiveness: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep gummies have significantly improved my ability to fall asleep quickly and stay asleep throughout the night. Unlike other sleep aids I've tried, which either didn't work or left me feeling groggy in the morning, these gummies provide a restful sleep with no next-day hangover. The extra strength formula seems to be the perfect dosage for my needs, helping me achieve deeper sleep cycles.Taste and Texture: One of the most pleasant surprises was how good these gummies taste. The flavor is enjoyable, which makes taking them before bed a treat rather than a chore. The texture is also just right—not too chewy, not too soft.Ingredients: I appreciate the transparency and quality of ingredients in OLLY Extra Strength Sleep. With a blend of Melatonin, L-Theanine, and botanicals like Chamomile, Lemon Balm, and Passionflower, it's reassuring to know I'm taking something natural to support my sleep.Ease of Use: The convenience of the gummy form cannot be overstated. It's easy to chew a couple before bed without needing water to swallow pills. Plus, the packaging is user-friendly and makes it simple to remember my nightly dose.Overall Satisfaction: Since incorporating OLLY Extra Strength Sleep into my bedtime routine, I've noticed a marked improvement in my sleep quality and, subsequently, my overall daily functioning. It's comforting to have a reliable, effective, and enjoyable option for those nights when sleep seems just out of reach.Verdict: If you're struggling with sleep and looking for a solution that's both effective and pleasant to take, OLLY Extra Strength Sleep gummies are worth trying. They've made a significant difference in my life, transforming restless nights into peaceful slumber. Highly recommended for anyone in need of a little extra help to achieve the restful night's sleep we all deserve.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I've been taking diphenhydramine HCl 50 mg (2 caplets Benadryl) and melatonin 10 mg nightly for over three years to help me fall and stay asleep. For the last 3 months, however, I had to stop taking diphenhydramine for health reasons, and the melatonin all by itself was not getting the job done. During this time I've tried many all-natural herbal sleep-aid products and haven't found one that works. So in cases where getting and falling asleep was an absolute must (i.e. big day the next day) I turned to my anti-anxiety prescription to get the job done. This was dangerous because I found myself relying more and more on my anti-anxiety pills to get sleep, and I wasn't about to become dependent/addicted to benzodiazapines to address my insomnia... talk about bringing a semi-automatic ak-47 pistol to a knife fight! Then I came across this product and read all the positive reviews it had regarding its effectiveness. I was hopeful, but remained skeptical since my level of insomnia, coupled with anxiety, is pretty high. I took the prescribed dosage of 2 gummies 20 minutes before bedtime, got myself ready for bed, and sat up in bed watching tv expecting a long, sleepless night. How about I found myself waking up to the sound of the tv 4 hours later? It works! It works well! Had I not had my tv on, I probably would have slept through the night until the morning alarm. So if you're on the fence about trying this out for yourself, wondering if it will work for your awful bouts of insomnia, let me knock you off that fence to the "Yes" side... you'll thank me for it... just like I thank all the other consumers who took the time to write a review about their positive experience with this product. (Oh, and btw, I feel bad for those of you who had their gummies all goop together during delivery... I'm happy to say that my experience was different. Mine were delivered in a bubble-wrapped UPS padded plastic package, with two freezer packs accompanying the product. Though the freezer packs were all melted by the time I got my package, they had done the job of keeping the gummies from melting together... mine were in perfect condition.) I hope this product works just as well for you as it has for me... I'm looking forward to tonight and getting more sleep! :)

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I have trouble sleeping and have tried the regular melatonine and a couple of other sleeping pills and they didnt work for me the way I had hoped. Some of them would knock my arse out for a whole day, while the others would give me creepy weird dreams. These ones work great!I work warehouse, 10+ hour days and my day starts early. I cant take anything that will leave me groggy in the morning at all. I take one of these as Im headed to bed or just a few minutes before, and it kicks in after I go to bed. It knocks me out pretty quick. It does not give you a "sleep through anything" kind of sleep, it just helps you get to sleep. Its not so strong that if you take it and change your mind about going to bed, your screwed. If you forgot something you had to do before going to bed, theres a good chance you can ignore it unless it hits you harder then it does myself. I take one of these with half of the regular sleep ones at around 8:30pm and am out by 9:30, and have no problem waking at 5:30am before my alarm goes off. Just to give you an idea of how it works for me. Might be worth a peak? Might not.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: My quality of sleep is amazing. I rest peacefully and am able to relax more. As long as you take the time to chew them long enough these do not take long at all to "kick in". I am disappointed in the fact that on a few occasions that I have received my Olly Melatonin they've been melted. The last order I received actually had freezer packs in the package but they were melted (freezer packs) but were still slightly cold so my gummies weren't melted this time. I have it set to where all of my Amazon packages are to be left on my back porch and the mail carrier doesn't pay attention or just doesn't care I guess because everything is left in the mailbox or the front porch where there is no shade or anything. I'm rating the product a 5 simply because the gummies work and I highly recommend them. I've seen some people who have said the gummies work for them but cause very vivid dreams or even abdominal pain. I haven't experienced either of those symptoms fortunately. If you're taking other medications speak with your doctor before taking these. Some side effects do come with the territory just as any other medicine does but melatonin can have side effects such as headache, short-term feelings of depression, daytime sleepiness, dizziness, stomach cramps, diarrhea and even irritability. I have noticed the irritability with me. Olly's goodbye stress gummies have been helping with that and I even highly recommend those!!

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I tried these on the advice of a friend who uses them. The flavor is a little strange, berry but not too sweet and with an almost licorice/anise bite, but very slight. The first pack I received was melted together with the heat and I spent 20 minutes peeling the gummies apart. I have had insomnia since childhood and take sleep aids almost every night. I get intrusive thoughts, especially at bedtime, because of anxiety. If you've ever been about to fall asleep and your brain throws a bad memory at you so hard that your body actually jerks, you know what I am talking about. I tried these, not thinking it would do so much but 50mg of benadryl plus 12mg of melatonin is leaving me with a medication hangover so, it's worth a try. SILENCE inside my head. I was reading and actually felt a little sleepy, put the book down and I. Fell. Asleep. This is how sleep is SUPPOSED TO BE. I'm not supposed to fight for it and try to trick it into coming on. Where has this been all my life?????And, to top off the beauty of it, my last delivery was in an insulated bag with an ice pack. EXCELLENT JOB, SHIPPING PEOPLE!!!Best sleep of my life.

ReviewContent: Ordered these when the regular strength Olly sleep gummies started to lose their potence. I generally do not get resistant to a melatonin product, but I had started waking up in the middle of the night and taking longer to fall asleep even when I increased the dose of regular strength gummies from two to three gummies, so I ordered a bag of these. Since I would need less gummies, I would get more milage for the money.I started out with one gummie of extra strength, and within 15 minutes I was fighting to stay awake. Within 30 minutes I was fast asleep in front of my computer. These gummies are stronger than some prescription muscle relaxers or even xanax. I stuck with one gummy because of how strong they are. They put me right out and I am able to wake up the next day without much of a melatonin hangover. I have trouble with oversleeping because melatonin and gummy products will take hours to kick in, so if I take say a regular strength olly gummy or a dayquil brand sleep gummy or melatonin tablet, it will take 2-3 hours before I fall asleep, so I will be asleep the next morning for longer than I want to be, or I will wake up in the early morning and remain exhausted from lack of sleep the whole next day. These gummies are so effective and under rated, these will help solve my sleep problems that I've had my whole life. Great product and will be buying for as long as they work.

ReviewContent: They advertise "THE POUCH: Less plastic, more gummies, same goodness.".  Now I do love the taste of these and they seem to help my sleep.  I bought them in the plastic bottle before at CVS and thought I'll try the pouch.  I am sorry to say the pouch was designed by someone looking to try and challenge Houdini.  OK it's double zipped for better protection of the product.  But unlike most double zipped items where you grip the top and open it .. you have to reach in, peel back a small 1/4 inch plastic lip, grab that with you fingers, and pull on that to open the zips.  If you have big fingers or any type of condition making grabbing a small item with fingers difficult, forget it you will fail, fail, fail to open it.  I simply cut the damn thing open with scissors and poured the gummies into the old plastic bottle.  So good product, BAD container.

ReviewContent: I have a hard time going to sleep and thought I would try them. They taste good and work in about 15 mins

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: We got this because it’s all organic, and replaced melatonin pills we used to taste. It’s a pleasant flavor and works quickly for me. Having sleep apnea, I’ll try anything for better sleep. I have this product on auto replenish so I never run out because I get more deep sleep than ever before.Secondly, our dog took my two gummies (yes, my mistake) one night. After being on the phone with the ASPCA for over an hour one night, they noted there is no chemical in this product that is known to harm dogs. Note: Do not give this to dogs as a sleep aid but I tell you this in case you’re looking for products that are “accident safe”. With our dog’s weight and size, and only taking the two gummies, he was safe.
ReviewTitle: This works! And no Xylitol (which is harmful to dogs)

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I have tried various melatonin supplements in the past and they had given me headaches or nausea so I completely gave up on melatonin, thinking I must be allergic or something. I was convinced on a vacation to try this as I was having trouble sleeping in the hotel. The taste is not very good the first 3-4 times you try these, blackberry mint is a weird mix. However, after taking these for a few months I look forward to the taste. These knock me right out and help me stay asleep. If you do wake up in the middle of the night it is safe to take more without risking major grogginess in the morning or risking your health.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I prefer to store them in the fridge. Just gives it more of a chew. Also have some great sleep on them. Tho, I’ve found I do talk a lot more in my sleep when I’ve had them than if I don’t have them.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I have used melatonin supplements for years for sleep and on a whim bought these. Honestly I was surprised by how well they work. Not sure if it’s that added L Theanine, but about 15 minutes after taking them my eyes start getting heavy. They are the best nonpharmacologic sleep aid I have ever used. The only thing I don’t like is the bag, but I solved that problem by putting them in a cute airtight jar. As you can see from the pic I need to order more! I highly recommend!

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: The media could not be loaded.                                                                                            Efficiency for sleeping issues. Now I could fall asleep and stay asleep all night
ReviewTitle: Very good can sleep all night

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)

It’s the exact same brand, flavor and everything but there is something off about these. I don’t think I will purchase them again from Amazon.

ReviewTitle: Amazon Doesn't Back The Product - But OLLY Does!

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I bought a bottle of these previously with no problems. This pouch I recently purchased to me is much different. Gummies are different size and taste a little different. And no brand stamp on gummies. Almost makes me think fakes. Not happy.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: My daughter and I have both taken 5mg melatonin before without issues, just not this brand. I woke up after a few hours with my heart racing and pounding in my ears and then was awake for the rest of the night out of fear it would happen again if I went back to sleep. As it turns out, my daughter woke up with her heart racing in the middle of the night as well. I'm not sure what the deal is, but we're both too scared to even try a half dose of 1 gummy to see if that would work better for us. Too bad I can't return it because there HAS to be something wrong with this batch. One person with one crazy heartbeat could be written off as a coincidence, but both of us? Not worth the risk to test it out again.
ReviewTitle: Two people, one night, will never use again

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: What I loved: The flavor is delightful and felt like I was treating myself to a piece of organic candy. If you are used to eating naturally and organically you will like the taste. If you are used to eating processed foods with fake flavorings and unnatural sugars like "grape" kool-aid, you will despise the taste.What I liked: The product didn't make me feel groggy  but once I fell asleep I was out for the count, sleeping deeper and longer than without using the gummies. Very vivid dreams and no waking up to go to the bathroom.What I didn't like: The price point is off the charts. $16 for gummies that last just a couple weeks is a crime. I also didn't like the sticky sugary gummies on my teeth right before bed, but that's just me. I felt stressed making sure I brushed my teeth properly to remove the gunk.Bottom line: I'm going back to liquid lemon balm. Half the price, lasts 4 times as long, and usually works just as well.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I purchased these gummies for a different taste approach to melatonin since tablets usually aren't pleasant in taste.  Reading the serving size & dose it's 2 gummies = 5mg meaning one gummy only has 2.5mg of melatonin which for me I usually need at least 10mg as a night shift nurse, I need a higher dose to really sleep sometimes.  There is 60, 2.5mg gummies and if a higher dose is needed, the more gummies you need, but the first ingredient is "glucose syrup" hmmmm... I think I'll stick to the other bitter "better" stuff and cheaper, not worth it.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: Kept waking up with a headache. Don’t work well for me.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I have been ordering this item for quite a while and have been very happy with it. It works well to aid in sleeping. Very disappointed this time as it arrived melted together and a big mess.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I reordered this recently, the packaging went from a plastic jar to a foil pouch. The pouch is hard to use and very noisey. When i tried to open it in the night, it was so loud it woke everyone else.  Like the product. Hate the packaging. Will not purchase again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: They do the job that they are supposed to and I appreciate the minimal packaging.  However, they cost more than other similar products on the market and for the price I guess I expected a better flavor.  That is why I bought a gummy in the first place - so my kid wouldn't have to take the nasty quick dissolve tablets we were using before.  These are still an improvement to that and initially they seem pretty tasty until you chew them, then they are just as bad as the tablets.  He just swallows them so that they don't taste bad, which means they take a bit longer to kick in.  As I said, they still do the job, but I'm going to try something else next time.
ReviewTitle: They work, but don't taste good.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: Good value for pricing. However, maybe it’s because I used it at the same time as a  PM fat burning capsule? Or body just needs to get used to it again? Either way, I’m sleeping really weird the past few days. I’ll figure it out and I’m stopping taking it every night for the meantime.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)

We’ve been buying the old formula at the stores when we see it, but will switch to a different product once we can’t find them in stores anymore. Disappointing to have them make this change.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: BUYER BEWARE! I've been taking these for years and during warm months, they come delivered with ice packs that have kept contents fresh. The first time the stale ones arrived, I chalked it up to a fluke as I've never had this problem before. Second package delivered yesterday, and they are just as nasty. No returns allowed on this item. BUYER BEWARE!

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: The product is supposed to come as 60 gummies. Instead, all the gummies melted together. I am not quite sure if it is still safe to eat this product given this kind of quality.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I've tried the 2mg dose of these gummies in the past and generally had a positive experience with them. It may be perhaps that this dosage is too strong for me, so I do not want to bash this product too harshly. I will say, however, that I did notice a positive difference in my ability to fall and stay asleep while taking these gummies. My only complaint is the general brain fog that I have consistently experienced upon waking up after taking this product. I've tested this multiple times on separate occasions to make sure that what I was experiencing was not a coincidence, and I can now say with near certainly that my body responds negatively to these gummies. While I do get in a bit more deep sleep during the night (I was able to track this on my Apple Watch), it seems to be irrelevant, as I feel fatigued and slightly disoriented for the entire day as if I hadn't slept much at all.
ReviewTitle: Will help you sleep... but at what cost?

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: After two nights I am throwing these out.Night 1 - took 2 as suggested . It took over and hour for them to kick in, which was fine. But they didn’t knock me out, put me in a lucid dream state over and over for 2 hours. I finally fell asleep for 1 hour and woke up. Is was 12am and I had such bad anxiety and headaches I couldn’t fall back asleep, again it’s 12am. Never was able to fall asleep.Night 2- after almost being up for 2 days you would think falling asleep would be easy. So I took 3 of these this time. I was so tired I probably didn’t need them and fell asleep within minutes of taking them. Again, woke up two hours later with intense anxiety , and sweats. Decided to take a Benadryl and I then was able to fall asleep for the entire night. The next day I had dizzy spells, a weird feeling of almost not being present, can’t really explain, and I had the worst pain behind my eyes.I’ve taken melatonin once before in my life and had lucid dreams, so I wasn’t a fan, but this was way beyond that. I’ve never in my entire life struggled the way I did with these . I truly will never take these again .

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: So one helps me sleep two keep me up for about 4 hours strange.  They taste awful but get the job done sooo ya.

ReviewContent: hey!! okay, so.. I love this product. It doesn’t force you to sleep which sometimes, I feel like I need. It takes me 3-5hours to fall asleep after taking this. Lights out.. audio book/soothing music/rain sounds or whatever you need to vibe. Unless you are able to fall asleep decently anyway, these will NOT push you into slumber.. they will, however, work w you to help you doze off eventually. ♡ PS— if you buy from OLLYS directly from their site, they insulate their packages muchhh better than Amazon. My 1-star rating is because I never got to use the ones sent by Amazon due to them melting into a liquid blob of disappointment.

Thank god I realized what it was before I spent money on expensive medical bills. Do not take this supplement if you have a sensitive digestive tract. This is supposedly high quality. It is garbage.

I couldn't sleep and I felt nauseous until 3:45 ish, where I finally dozed off again.  I woke up in the morning feeling extremely tired, but glad the stomach pain was gone.  It was a horrible experience, I'm not trying this product again.

ReviewContent: SLOW processing, and they change and extend the shipping date every time. I have received this product melted more than once now. It’s unacceptable. I have pictures of the damage, puny ice packs, and melted product. The taste is good, but I’m really not convinced they work. I had to wait to receive the delivery and ran out. Couldn’t tell a difference in sleep having not taken the product. See details in pictures.

Will not purchase again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: We bought these because my husband has Celiac's disease and we could take them together. They are labeled on the front and back of the package that they are gluten free but made on lines containing gluten. Cross contamination can get people sick and is a serious problem. I don't care for products that carry that label, but don't seem to care about it. Don't purchase these if you need them to be gluten free.
ReviewTitle: Not Gluten free. Celiac and gluten intolerant people be warned

ReviewContent: So lately I been having this bad habit of staying awake at night sleeping early in the morning and waking up in the after noon  so i decided to gives these a try that way it’ll be easier for me to sleep at night instead of staying up like I usually do before I tried to 3mg purple one it did made me tired but not to the point where it’ll make me fall asleep quickly  but this one really makes me tired which is the plan like there be times were i didn’t even realize I fell asleep until I wake up it works it doesn’t put me into deep sleep because i wake up by my alarm sometimes I wake up tired it just depends how many hours I slept like If I only slept 4 or 5 hours and they taste good so that’s a plus

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I have been using OLLY gummies for several months and can say they may help. My experience indicates, however, that they are most helpful when used least. By that I mean the body seems to habituate to the pill and not work as well if used frequently. That is why I learned to not have a gummy every night. Each person is different and you have to find what dosage and frequency works best for you. Another issue that you need to take into account has to do with storage and shipping temperatures. As another customer noted, heat causes the gummies to sort of "melt." That occurred to me yesterday when a new pack was shipped from Kentucky to Texas via UPS Next Day Air, a two day time period. Upon arrival, I was impressed that two little cool packs were in the Amazon delivery package. The bad news was that the cool packs were warm. I immediately opened the OLLY package and found the pills were mushy and sticking to each other and the packaging. I poured them out on a plate, separated the gummies, and cooled them off in the frig for a while. They were okay at that point to put back in the package and treat them as normal (on a shelf in an air conditioned house.) If your house is too warm, you should keep the package in a fridge.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: If you’re having trouble slipping into the sweet embrace of sleep, let me introduce you to OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummies, the little treat that knows exactly how to get you in the mood. These gummies are packed with 5 mg of Melatonin and a touch of L-Theanine, working together to gently guide you into the arms of Morpheus.With just one taste, you'll find yourself surrendering to their irresistible charm. They're sweet, but not too sweet — just the right amount of temptation to make you want more. And trust me, one gummy is enough to get the job done. These little delights work their magic slowly, coaxing you into relaxation with every soft chew until you're completely under their spell.The L-Theanine adds just the right amount of calm to help you unwind, while the Melatonin does the heavy lifting, carrying you away into a world where your worries melt away. It's like a gentle caress that eases you into dreamland, making you feel like you're floating on a cloud.So, if you're looking to spice up your nightly routine and want something that really knows how to put you to bed, OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummies are here to satisfy. Just pop one in, let it do its thing, and before you know it, you’ll be sinking into your sheets, ready for a night of deep, uninterrupted pleasure... I mean, sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: Finding a sleep aid that works can feel like searching for a needle in a haystack. With OLLY Extra Strength Sleep gummies, my search may finally be over. This product has been a revelation in my nightly routine, offering me the restful sleep that had been eluding me for so long. Here's why I'm now a firm believer in these sleep gummies:Effectiveness: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep gummies have significantly improved my ability to fall asleep quickly and stay asleep throughout the night. Unlike other sleep aids I've tried, which either didn't work or left me feeling groggy in the morning, these gummies provide a restful sleep with no next-day hangover. The extra strength formula seems to be the perfect dosage for my needs, helping me achieve deeper sleep cycles.Taste and Texture: One of the most pleasant surprises was how good these gummies taste. The flavor is enjoyable, which makes taking them before bed a treat rather than a chore. The texture is also just right—not too chewy, not too soft.Ingredients: I appreciate the transparency and quality of ingredients in OLLY Extra Strength Sleep. With a blend of Melatonin, L-Theanine, and botanicals like Chamomile, Lemon Balm, and Passionflower, it's reassuring to know I'm taking something natural to support my sleep.Ease of Use: The convenience of the gummy form cannot be overstated. It's easy to chew a couple before bed without needing water to swallow pills. Plus, the packaging is user-friendly and makes it simple to remember my nightly dose.Overall Satisfaction: Since incorporating OLLY Extra Strength Sleep into my bedtime routine, I've noticed a marked improvement in my sleep quality and, subsequently, my overall daily functioning. It's comforting to have a reliable, effective, and enjoyable option for those nights when sleep seems just out of reach.Verdict: If you're struggling with sleep and looking for a solution that's both effective and pleasant to take, OLLY Extra Strength Sleep gummies are worth trying. They've made a significant difference in my life, transforming restless nights into peaceful slumber. Highly recommended for anyone in need of a little extra help to achieve the restful night's sleep we all deserve.
ReviewTitle: Restful Nights Ahead: My Experience with OLLY Extra Strength Sleep

ReviewContent: Mine melted and concreted the seal so i had to cut it open to see what i was working with. Defiantly recommend.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I've been taking diphenhydramine HCl 50 mg (2 caplets Benadryl) and melatonin 10 mg nightly for over three years to help me fall and stay asleep. For the last 3 months, however, I had to stop taking diphenhydramine for health reasons, and the melatonin all by itself was not getting the job done. During this time I've tried many all-natural herbal sleep-aid products and haven't found one that works. So in cases where getting and falling asleep was an absolute must (i.e. big day the next day) I turned to my anti-anxiety prescription to get the job done. This was dangerous because I found myself relying more and more on my anti-anxiety pills to get sleep, and I wasn't about to become dependent/addicted to benzodiazapines to address my insomnia... talk about bringing a semi-automatic ak-47 pistol to a knife fight! Then I came across this product and read all the positive reviews it had regarding its effectiveness. I was hopeful, but remained skeptical since my level of insomnia, coupled with anxiety, is pretty high. I took the prescribed dosage of 2 gummies 20 minutes before bedtime, got myself ready for bed, and sat up in bed watching tv expecting a long, sleepless night. How about I found myself waking up to the sound of the tv 4 hours later? It works! It works well! Had I not had my tv on, I probably would have slept through the night until the morning alarm. So if you're on the fence about trying this out for yourself, wondering if it will work for your awful bouts of insomnia, let me knock you off that fence to the "Yes" side... you'll thank me for it... just like I thank all the other consumers who took the time to write a review about their positive experience with this product. (Oh, and btw, I feel bad for those of you who had their gummies all goop together during delivery... I'm happy to say that my experience was different. Mine were delivered in a bubble-wrapped UPS padded plastic package, with two freezer packs accompanying the product. Though the freezer packs were all melted by the time I got my package, they had done the job of keeping the gummies from melting together... mine were in perfect condition.) I hope this product works just as well for you as it has for me... I'm looking forward to tonight and getting more sleep! :)

I've seen some people who have said the gummies work for them but cause very vivid dreams or even abdominal pain. I haven't experienced either of those symptoms fortunately. If you're taking other medications speak with your doctor before taking these. I get intrusive thoughts, especially at bedtime, because of anxiety. If you've ever been about to fall asleep and your brain throws a bad memory at you so hard that your body actually jerks, you know what I am talking about. I tried these, not thinking it would do so much but 50mg of benadryl plus 12mg of melatonin is leaving me with a medication hangover so, it's worth a try. SILENCE inside my head. I was reading and actually felt a little sleepy, put the book down and I. Fell. Asleep. This is how sleep is SUPPOSED TO BE. I'm not supposed to fight for it and try to trick it into coming on. Where has this been all my life?????And, to top off the beauty of it, my last delivery was in an insulated bag with an ice pack. EXCELLENT JOB, SHIPPING PEOPLE!!!Best sleep of my life.

Since I would need less gummies, I would get more milage for the money.I started out with one gummie of extra strength, and within 15 minutes I was fighting to stay awake. Within 30 minutes I was fast asleep in front of my computer. These gummies are stronger than some prescription muscle relaxers or even xanax. I stuck with one gummy because of how strong they are. They put me right out and I am able to wake up the next day without much of a melatonin hangover. I have trouble with oversleeping because melatonin and gummy products will take hours to kick in, so if I take say a regular strength olly gummy or a dayquil brand sleep gummy or melatonin tablet, it will take 2-3 hours before I fall asleep, so I will be asleep the next morning for longer than I want to be, or I will wake up in the early morning and remain exhausted from lack of sleep the whole next day. These gummies are so effective and under rated, these will help solve my sleep problems that I've had my whole life. Great product and will be buying for as long as they work.

It’s great).I did recently hear about a study showing that melatonin gummies tend to have way (like a lot more) more melatonin than advertised.  I don’t know how Olly stacks up to that and if they can confirm their product accurately reflects the amount contained?Overall I have used lots of Olly products and always been pleased with quality and consistency.  Would recommend.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I have severe anxiety and PTSD and have not found a prescription medication that helps me with sleeping in the 10 years that I got diagnosed with PTSD, normally the only thing that would’ve worked is melatonin but usually I would’ve taken it in very unhealthy doses (usually between 90-130 mg nightly) and I had bought these gummy‘s just to see if they actually did anything, and they absolutely work. I usually take them about 90 minutes before I go to sleep, because that’s how much time it takes for it to work for me. It helps you go to sleep very subtly and at least for me I get a full nights rest and wake up refreshed in the morning.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: Works as intended.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: Product does what it says, helps knock you out quickly with one or two gummies. I found after not using it for a few days though that I realized my sleep patterns were altered by taking these.Whenever taking the gummies I would wake up every night at 2am sharp as if the dose was wearing off and suddenly I was wide awake. After I stopped taking these for a few days I found myself sleeping through the entire night but waking up tired. I’ve since decided to stop taking these as I feel I get a worse quality of sleep. Would only take them again if I was suffering from insomnia or had to go to sleep at an odd hour (ie early morning flights)One more note… I won’t be ordering these from Amazon in the future as the last package I received was completely melted and the gummies were liquid.
ReviewTitle: Helps put you to sleep but not stay asleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: Even on 6 hours of sleep (or marginally less), this gummy has not led to drowsiness in the morning. Also, without fail, I can get to sleep in a reasonable time frame. As someone who, without the aid of some form of self-medication, will lay awake riddled with anxiety, etc., for hours, this is an absolute blessing. Melatonin in general may accomplish the same thing, but the pills by themselves have given side effects that these gummies don't seem to have. Can't recommend enough.
ReviewTitle: Taken most every night, not drowsy at all, and most importantly - sleeping is easy now

Disappointed of course, but was able to put them apart, still in shape, spread them on a wax paper lined plate for 2 mins, coat in corn starch & either store in container or plastic zip lock bag. Anyways, these gummies KNOCK me out and I’ve been taken sleeping pills for 3 years now. Overall I love Olly products

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: As I take a prescription sleep aid every night, I was skeptical of this product. I am currently weaning off my RX to start a different medication, and my doctor suggested this specific brand of melatonin. I thought to myself, yeah, sure. I’ll try it so I can honestly tell him it doesn’t work. Boy was I WRONG!! I love this product!! I love the taste, the texture, and how effectively it works. I begin to get drowsy about 20-30 minutes after taking it. It is a little bit pricey for MY budget and I tried another gummy, and the taste was awful. So I am sticking with Olly’s!!! LOVE IT!!

ReviewContent: I have taken the regular strenths ones and had good results.  LOVE the extrastrength better.....I can always fall asleep but have trouble staying asleep. I like the extrastrength ones esp.  My husband has a hard time falling asleep and found these helpful actually making him restful feeling after about 30 min.  I highly recommend trying these!  ++caution though...living in Florida they melted while in the mailbox.  I do NOT get the mail every day so they prob sat there a couple of days in the upper 80-90 heat SO if you order please check for them daily.  I will REorder.  They were appropriately packaged but it is just so HOT here already.  The extraStrength ones are hard for me to find in the stores so prefer to order.

ReviewContent: These are very tasty, and work like a charm.  It used to take me 2 hours to fall asleep.  Now it takes about 15 minutes.  No draggy feeling when I wake up the next day either.  I've persuaded my husband to use them too, and now we both swear by them.  Recommended.
ReviewTitle: No More Tossing & Turning Through the Night!

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I've been suffering with sleeplessness since the beginning of 2021, after my hypothyroidism diagnosis. I've been so over it and decided to give these gummies a try. I love all berry flavors so the flavor of these gummies taste delicious to me. They're not watery or sticky-like, like natural fruit gummies. They have a good thick constancy which I love. So easy to eat. I have been taking 2 every night, for a week now, and they've helped with my sleep tremendously. I start getting sleepy between 30min - 1 hour after taking them, so I try to take them right before my shower or shortly after so I get to bed sooner. I stay asleep throughout the whole night now, without getting restless like before. I'm so glad I got these gummies. I'm going to keep getting them!
ReviewTitle: So Yummy & Effective! I'm finally sleeping better!

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: Mine melted and concreted the seal so i had to cut it open to see what i was working with. I think it melting may have been solely my fault, not the company’s, as it sat in the summer heat almost all day until i got home from work, either way, be aware it could be a big sticky mess upon opening. Company did refund me my money + shipping. It does still taste and smell very good, and i did cut it open to get it out and i cut it up into what looks to me like the 60-ish equal-ish portions that it was supposed to be but it looks like a crime scene so im not going to post that here. I have various diagnosed sleep disorders, this does help me sleep longer than without it, but I still cant sleep all night long. I wake up feeling good after taking this the night before. Definitely recommend but be aware it could potentially be a melted gummy pancake inside.

Not sure if it’s that added L Theanine, but about 15 minutes after taking them my eyes start getting heavy. They are the best nonpharmacologic sleep aid I have ever used. The only thing I don’t like is the bag, but I solved that problem by putting them in a cute airtight jar. As you can see from the pic I need to order more! I highly recommend!

ReviewContent: SLOW processing, and they change and extend the shipping date every time. I have received this product melted more than once now. It’s unacceptable. ReviewContent: We bought these because my husband has Celiac's disease and we could take them together. They are labeled on the front and back of the package that they are gluten free but made on lines containing gluten. Cross contamination can get people sick and is a serious problem. I don't care for products that carry that label, but don't seem to care about it. Don't purchase these if you need them to be gluten free.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: If you’re having trouble slipping into the sweet embrace of sleep, let me introduce you to OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummies, the little treat that knows exactly how to get you in the mood. These gummies are packed with 5 mg of Melatonin and a touch of L-Theanine, working together to gently guide you into the arms of Morpheus.With just one taste, you'll find yourself surrendering to their irresistible charm. They're sweet, but not too sweet — just the right amount of temptation to make you want more. And trust me, one gummy is enough to get the job done. These little delights work their magic slowly, coaxing you into relaxation with every soft chew until you're completely under their spell.The L-Theanine adds just the right amount of calm to help you unwind, while the Melatonin does the heavy lifting, carrying you away into a world where your worries melt away. It's like a gentle caress that eases you into dreamland, making you feel like you're floating on a cloud.So, if you're looking to spice up your nightly routine and want something that really knows how to put you to bed, OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummies are here to satisfy. Just pop one in, let it do its thing, and before you know it, you’ll be sinking into your sheets, ready for a night of deep, uninterrupted pleasure... I mean, sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: If you’re having trouble slipping into the sweet embrace of sleep, let me introduce you to OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummies, the little treat that knows exactly how to get you in the mood. These gummies are packed with 5 mg of Melatonin and a touch of L-Theanine, working together to gently guide you into the arms of Morpheus.With just one taste, you'll find yourself surrendering to their irresistible charm. They're sweet, but not too sweet — just the right amount of temptation to make you want more. And trust me, one gummy is enough to get the job done. These little delights work their magic slowly, coaxing you into relaxation with every soft chew until you're completely under their spell.The L-Theanine adds just the right amount of calm to help you unwind, while the Melatonin does the heavy lifting, carrying you away into a world where your worries melt away. It's like a gentle caress that eases you into dreamland, making you feel like you're floating on a cloud.So, if you're looking to spice up your nightly routine and want something that really knows how to put you to bed, OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummies are here to satisfy. Just pop one in, let it do its thing, and before you know it, you’ll be sinking into your sheets, ready for a night of deep, uninterrupted pleasure... I mean, sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: Finding a sleep aid that works can feel like searching for a needle in a haystack. With OLLY Extra Strength Sleep gummies, my search may finally be over. This product has been a revelation in my nightly routine, offering me the restful sleep that had been eluding me for so long. Here's why I'm now a firm believer in these sleep gummies:Effectiveness: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep gummies have significantly improved my ability to fall asleep quickly and stay asleep throughout the night. Unlike other sleep aids I've tried, which either didn't work or left me feeling groggy in the morning, these gummies provide a restful sleep with no next-day hangover. The extra strength formula seems to be the perfect dosage for my needs, helping me achieve deeper sleep cycles.Taste and Texture: One of the most pleasant surprises was how good these gummies taste. The flavor is enjoyable, which makes taking them before bed a treat rather than a chore. The texture is also just right—not too chewy, not too soft.Ingredients: I appreciate the transparency and quality of ingredients in OLLY Extra Strength Sleep. With a blend of Melatonin, L-Theanine, and botanicals like Chamomile, Lemon Balm, and Passionflower, it's reassuring to know I'm taking something natural to support my sleep.Ease of Use: The convenience of the gummy form cannot be overstated. It's easy to chew a couple before bed without needing water to swallow pills. Plus, the packaging is user-friendly and makes it simple to remember my nightly dose.Overall Satisfaction: Since incorporating OLLY Extra Strength Sleep into my bedtime routine, I've noticed a marked improvement in my sleep quality and, subsequently, my overall daily functioning. It's comforting to have a reliable, effective, and enjoyable option for those nights when sleep seems just out of reach.Verdict: If you're struggling with sleep and looking for a solution that's both effective and pleasant to take, OLLY Extra Strength Sleep gummies are worth trying. They've made a significant difference in my life, transforming restless nights into peaceful slumber. Highly recommended for anyone in need of a little extra help to achieve the restful night's sleep we all deserve.
ReviewTitle: Restful Nights Ahead: My Experience with OLLY Extra Strength Sleep

Company did refund me my money + shipping. It does still taste and smell very good, and i did cut it open to get it out and i cut it up into what looks to me like the 60-ish equal-ish portions that it was supposed to be but it looks like a crime scene so im not going to post that here. I have various diagnosed sleep disorders, this does help me sleep longer than without it, but I still cant sleep all night long. I wake up feeling good after taking this the night before. Definitely recommend but be aware it could potentially be a melted gummy pancake inside.

ReviewContent: I used to take a prescription sleep aid, but I know they’re definitely not good for you long term, so I switched to more naturalI take a combination of one of these and one of the OLLY Rest plant based sleep aids at night and they really help me doze off and get a good nights sleep. Defiantly recommend.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I've been taking diphenhydramine HCl 50 mg (2 caplets Benadryl) and melatonin 10 mg nightly for over three years to help me fall and stay asleep. For the last 3 months, however, I had to stop taking diphenhydramine for health reasons, and the melatonin all by itself was not getting the job done. During this time I've tried many all-natural herbal sleep-aid products and haven't found one that works. So in cases where getting and falling asleep was an absolute must (i.e. big day the next day) I turned to my anti-anxiety prescription to get the job done. This was dangerous because I found myself relying more and more on my anti-anxiety pills to get sleep, and I wasn't about to become dependent/addicted to benzodiazapines to address my insomnia... talk about bringing a semi-automatic ak-47 pistol to a knife fight! Then I came across this product and read all the positive reviews it had regarding its effectiveness. I was hopeful, but remained skeptical since my level of insomnia, coupled with anxiety, is pretty high. I took the prescribed dosage of 2 gummies 20 minutes before bedtime, got myself ready for bed, and sat up in bed watching tv expecting a long, sleepless night. How about I found myself waking up to the sound of the tv 4 hours later? It works! It works well! Had I not had my tv on, I probably would have slept through the night until the morning alarm. So if you're on the fence about trying this out for yourself, wondering if it will work for your awful bouts of insomnia, let me knock you off that fence to the "Yes" side... you'll thank me for it... just like I thank all the other consumers who took the time to write a review about their positive experience with this product. (Oh, and btw, I feel bad for those of you who had their gummies all goop together during delivery... I'm happy to say that my experience was different. Mine were delivered in a bubble-wrapped UPS padded plastic package, with two freezer packs accompanying the product. Though the freezer packs were all melted by the time I got my package, they had done the job of keeping the gummies from melting together... mine were in perfect condition.) I hope this product works just as well for you as it has for me... I'm looking forward to tonight and getting more sleep! :)

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I have trouble sleeping and have tried the regular melatonine and a couple of other sleeping pills and they didnt work for me the way I had hoped. Some of them would knock my arse out for a whole day, while the others would give me creepy weird dreams. These ones work great!I work warehouse, 10+ hour days and my day starts early. I cant take anything that will leave me groggy in the morning at all. I take one of these as Im headed to bed or just a few minutes before, and it kicks in after I go to bed. It knocks me out pretty quick. It does not give you a "sleep through anything" kind of sleep, it just helps you get to sleep. Its not so strong that if you take it and change your mind about going to bed, your screwed. If you forgot something you had to do before going to bed, theres a good chance you can ignore it unless it hits you harder then it does myself. I take one of these with half of the regular sleep ones at around 8:30pm and am out by 9:30, and have no problem waking at 5:30am before my alarm goes off. Just to give you an idea of how it works for me. Might be worth a peak? Might not.
ReviewTitle: Love the extra strength sleep gummies

I've seen some people who have said the gummies work for them but cause very vivid dreams or even abdominal pain. I haven't experienced either of those symptoms fortunately. If you're taking other medications speak with your doctor before taking these. ReviewContent: I tried these on the advice of a friend who uses them. The flavor is a little strange, berry but not too sweet and with an almost licorice/anise bite, but very slight. The first pack I received was melted together with the heat and I spent 20 minutes peeling the gummies apart. I have had insomnia since childhood and take sleep aids almost every night. I get intrusive thoughts, especially at bedtime, because of anxiety. If you've ever been about to fall asleep and your brain throws a bad memory at you so hard that your body actually jerks, you know what I am talking about. I tried these, not thinking it would do so much but 50mg of benadryl plus 12mg of melatonin is leaving me with a medication hangover so, it's worth a try. SILENCE inside my head. I was reading and actually felt a little sleepy, put the book down and I. Fell. Asleep. This is how sleep is SUPPOSED TO BE. I'm not supposed to fight for it and try to trick it into coming on. Where has this been all my life?????And, to top off the beauty of it, my last delivery was in an insulated bag with an ice pack. EXCELLENT JOB, SHIPPING PEOPLE!!!Best sleep of my life.

Within 30 minutes I was fast asleep in front of my computer. These gummies are stronger than some prescription muscle relaxers or even xanax. I stuck with one gummy because of how strong they are. They put me right out and I am able to wake up the next day without much of a melatonin hangover. I have trouble with oversleeping because melatonin and gummy products will take hours to kick in, so if I take say a regular strength olly gummy or a dayquil brand sleep gummy or melatonin tablet, it will take 2-3 hours before I fall asleep, so I will be asleep the next morning for longer than I want to be, or I will wake up in the early morning and remain exhausted from lack of sleep the whole next day. It's like a gentle caress that eases you into dreamland, making you feel like you're floating on a cloud.So, if you're looking to spice up your nightly routine and want something that really knows how to put you to bed, OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummies are here to satisfy. ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I have been using OLLY gummies for several months and can say they may help. My experience indicates, however, that they are most helpful when used least. By that I mean the body seems to habituate to the pill and not work as well if used frequently. That is why I learned to not have a gummy every night. Each person is different and you have to find what dosage and frequency works best for you. Another issue that you need to take into account has to do with storage and shipping temperatures. As another customer noted, heat causes the gummies to sort of "melt." That occurred to me yesterday when a new pack was shipped from Kentucky to Texas via UPS Next Day Air, a two day time period. Upon arrival, I was impressed that two little cool packs were in the Amazon delivery package. The bad news was that the cool packs were warm. I immediately opened the OLLY package and found the pills were mushy and sticking to each other and the packaging. I poured them out on a plate, separated the gummies, and cooled them off in the frig for a while. They were okay at that point to put back in the package and treat them as normal (on a shelf in an air conditioned house.) If your house is too warm, you should keep the package in a fridge.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I like to pop 2 of these whenever I feel super energised around 8pm, to calm me down and get ready to unwind at home.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: They advertise "THE POUCH: Less plastic, more gummies, same goodness.".  Now I do love the taste of these and they seem to help my sleep.  I bought them in the plastic bottle before at CVS and thought I'll try the pouch.  I am sorry to say the pouch was designed by someone looking to try and challenge Houdini.  OK it's double zipped for better protection of the product.  But unlike most double zipped items where you grip the top and open it .. you have to reach in, peel back a small 1/4 inch plastic lip, grab that with you fingers, and pull on that to open the zips.  If you have big fingers or any type of condition making grabbing a small item with fingers difficult, forget it you will fail, fail, fail to open it.  I simply cut the damn thing open with scissors and poured the gummies into the old plastic bottle.  So good product, BAD container.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I got a sample size in my Christmas stocking with 10 gummies in in (5 days worth) and I slept all 5 days! It's like a miracle. I immediately bought a much larger size. I hope it continues to work as I have suffered with insomnia for years. My only complaint is that I get a little heartburn during the night, but I have found if I take an antacid before bed it's much better. Not a bad flavor and the cost of getting a good night sleep is so worth it. I would give it 8.5 - 9.0/10.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I bought these in order to coax myself to be sleepy earlier in the evening.  I'm a chronic insomniac who ends up staying awake way too late into the evening and then dragging butt the next day.These gummies had a great flavor and no aftertaste at all.  About 45 minutes after ingesting I would get a mellow blissful sleepy feeling which was nice.  They did wear off at about the four hour period so I don't feel like you could sleep an entire night on these alone.  I did plan on buying more but the price jumped by over $7.00 so I plan to look elsewhere for something similar.  ❤

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I have been having trouble sleeping for years. I have tried tons of products. I heard about Olly products and especially about the sleep gummies since I have a problem sleeping. They don't knock me out, but they do relax me enough to fall asleep. Since I have been taking Olly sleep gummies. I have slept more in the last month than I have in the past two years.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I have had a hard time falling asleep and staying asleep since I first started college about 7 years ago. I could finally fall asleep but would only sleep good for a couple of hours and then wake up, only to toss and turn and doze off and on throughout the rest of the night. Regular melatonin did nothing. I would usually pop about 3 Benadryl AND a melatonin just to help me get any amount of sleep.I have been taking these for a week now and YALL. I can already tell a MAJOR difference. I fall asleep, stay asleep, and my alarm has actually woken me up every morning this week! So amazing!My only complaint is that it has been harder to wake up and get out of bed because I’m still SO sleepy when my alarm goes off, but that tends to go away after about 5 mins!Definitely worth a try!

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I’ve had insomnia since I was a child. — I know, a doctor should’ve helped with that, but they haven’t. I received different advice but many products hadn’t worked for me.I decided to try these after seeing the raving reviews on another chain store’s app. To my surprise, they actually help me sleep. I started off with the regular strength, which I take more often than these.IMPORTANT NOTE:Melatonin can cause some side effects that may creep up on you without notice. Drowsiness, blurred vision, headaches, & depressive emotions. I’ve experienced all of it—the last one: I took some of these gummies while I was in a funk, & a depressive spell came over me that I knew wasn’t like me or normal, as I’m very aware of myself. TMI to some, but I recall bringing this up to a family member & they immediately identified experiencing similar side effects. It’s important we’re open about our side effects so that others are aware of themselves; this can affect your chemistry beyond sleep, naturally. - that’s why I took off a star, considering I had to look these side effects up myself after noticing a pattern.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: It's May, temps are under 80 degrees, and these arrived in one day. Whoever shipped them contemplated the possibility that these gummies would melt in warm weather, because two small "cold packs" were included in the packaging. However, both of the "cold packs" AND the product were very warm on arrival. So the attempt to protect the product from heat was not very effective. The bag is currently chilling in the fridge, and I'll keep the product as long as I can separate each gummy. But I'm not very happy about having to open the package prematurely to inspect the contents. There is no way I'll order these again once summer starts in earnest.
ReviewTitle: "Nice try" on the packaging...don't buy these in warm weather

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)

ReviewContent: I have a very difficult time going to sleep. These gummies had me snoozing in about twenty minutes. I did wake up earlier than I wanted but still got five hours. An improvement for sure!

ReviewContent: GREAT Product, when it arrives correctly, not out of date (expired) and hasn't been punctured.I have had two of this product arrive either expired, or punctured, rendering it useless. And, Amazon doesn't care. They told me reach out to OLLY, when they are the distributor. I recommend just going through OLLY directly, if you can, as they have AMAZING customer service, and don't try and argue with you.
ReviewTitle: Amazon Doesn't Back The Product - But OLLY Does!

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: What I loved: The flavor is delightful and felt like I was treating myself to a piece of organic candy. If you are used to eating naturally and organically you will like the taste. If you are used to eating processed foods with fake flavorings and unnatural sugars like "grape" kool-aid, you will despise the taste.What I liked: The product didn't make me feel groggy  but once I fell asleep I was out for the count, sleeping deeper and longer than without using the gummies. Very vivid dreams and no waking up to go to the bathroom.What I didn't like: The price point is off the charts. $16 for gummies that last just a couple weeks is a crime. I also didn't like the sticky sugary gummies on my teeth right before bed, but that's just me. I felt stressed making sure I brushed my teeth properly to remove the gunk.Bottom line: I'm going back to liquid lemon balm. Half the price, lasts 4 times as long, and usually works just as well.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: I purchased these gummies for a different taste approach to melatonin since tablets usually aren't pleasant in taste.  Reading the serving size & dose it's 2 gummies = 5mg meaning one gummy only has 2.5mg of melatonin which for me I usually need at least 10mg as a night shift nurse, I need a higher dose to really sleep sometimes.  There is 60, 2.5mg gummies and if a higher dose is needed, the more gummies you need, but the first ingredient is "glucose syrup" hmmmm... I think I'll stick to the other bitter "better" stuff and cheaper, not worth it.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: Kept waking up with a headache. Don’t work well for me.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
ReviewContent: They do the job that they are supposed to and I appreciate the minimal packaging.  However, they cost more than other similar products on the market and for the price I guess I expected a better flavor.  That is why I bought a gummy in the first place - so my kid wouldn't have to take the nasty quick dissolve tablets we were using before.  These are still an improvement to that and initially they seem pretty tasty until you chew them, then they are just as bad as the tablets.  He just swallows them so that they don't taste bad, which means they take a bit longer to kick in.  As I said, they still do the job, but I'm going to try something else next time.

ReviewContent: I love these , I ran out and ordered some and it’s July in Maryland , it didn’t survive the trip intact and is now a sheet of gummy sleep aid . I feel like I need to stock up in the winter months so I can avoid ordering these in summer months . It’s usually ok tho . Iv had a few orders this summer arrive perfectly fine . It’s been the bottles that seem to stand up a tad better in the heat I think . Seeing other reviews with bottles of melted gummies makes me think that they just might be delicate in heat no matter what they are shipped in . Still love them and won’t give up on them just yet .
ReviewTitle: Great but melted in transit . Think I Need to stock up to in cold months

ReviewContent: I am a user of OLLY melatonin for a long time. Before this bought, I was eating normal Blackberry zen flavor (not EXTREME one). In comparison, this EXTREME one I bought this time, has a similar flavor as the normal one, but the sleepy effect is stronger. I often feel unawake when get up in the morning. I think I will return to the normal Blackberry zen next time.

ReviewContent: These gummies are not as soft as the ones I buy at the store. They are a lot harder and almost stale tasting. They aren’t expired and don’t expire until 2025. Straight out of the bag they were hard so not like I left them out or anything. I’m also not sure they work as well as the store bought. It’s the exact same brand, flavor and everything but there is something off about these. I don’t think I will purchase them again from Amazon.

ProductTitle: OLLY Extra Strength Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 5 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm Extracts, Sleep Aid, BlackBerry Flavor - 120 Count (Packaging May Vary)
